description: Maintained desktop application that utilizes .NET framework and Syncfusion library.
Collaborated with civil engineers to address bug reports and implement enhancements for various construction software solutions.
Resolved ad-hoc frontend issues and developed user interface components to optimize user experience and enhance web app functionality that utilizes Nuxt framework and Bootstrap library.
Localized web content into multiple languages Vue I18n to broaden accessibility.
Built an end-to-end (E2E) testing using Playwright for efficient quality assurance processes.
Developed a custom Playwright wrapper to streamline API interactions, alongside implementing a REST API for configuring the E2E test environment.
Implemented sophisticated modules, e.g., form fillers, and extended Day.js library into a plugin to streamline testing procedures and improve date and time handling accuracy.
